Very nice fabric and pattern. I’m 5’0, 130lbs with a 34 DD chest and the small fits perfectly. It’s a very feminine blouse- gorgeous pink and orange flowers with paisley.

I bought this but unfortunately had to return it due to sizing.  Since it is lined, if you are a little busty I recommend going up a size, it was a little tight across the chest. It flowed nicely and I'm sure it would be great for summer or fall since it's very light weight.

It's very pretty but runs very large. I am usually an XS or a Small but this was more like a Medium.

This blouse is really pretty! I saw it in an online article and took a chance, I'm glad I did as I really like it. The sleeves are sheer, but there is a tank style lining for the bodice. Looks well made, good value.

The pink color is pretty but the white lining fabric shows through and distorts the pink color making it look cheap. The gray color is much nicer. You don’t notice the lining although it’s there. The fit is very nice.

Every-time I wear this top people stop complement me on how gorgous it is - I tell them "I bought it on Amazon!".  I love that its so light and airy yet durable and not too see-thru.  A very "flirty" addition to any wardrobe.

This yellow floral top is great!!! There is a slip part inside the top that is soft and feels cool on my skin. I love the florals and colors!! It fits me well, I bought an XL. I am 5'10" 190lbs for reference. This top looks great longer or tucked in. I bought it for my upcoming girls wine tasting trip. Decently priced, shipping was quick. I like to wear this top as shown in my 1st picture. Its a flowy top and I pinned it back at the waist above the tailbone area with a safety pin because I wanted it to look more fitted to my body. So there are really 3 ways to wear this top, pinned back/fitted, tucked into pants/bottoms, or loose and flowy. Try it all 3 ways till you find your comfortable. I will keep this top, and I plan to buy more colors soon. This is a beautiful, soft floral feminine top. =).
